data.title: Good food, good price
data.text: Looking for a quick lunch or dinner of some good Hispanic food then stop by for a meal.  The service is fast, food is hot and healthy portions make for a deal of a place to eat.

data.title: Good Mexican food wide selection
data.text: Good food , Taqueria style sitting, nothing crazy. good for lunch dinner if you want to take out. Seafood plates are good and have much flavor and can be requested to be made hot if you like your food with that jalepeno hottness

data.title: YUM-AZ-ING
data.text: Im not sure yum-az-ing ever existed until this place (also because I made that word up) but seriously, it sums up my experience. The portions are huge and the price is CHEAP. A huge chimichanga a shrimp taco and a fish taco came to $17.00. Perfect date night if you are on a budget for sure and you enjoy Mexican food. Don't be discouraged when you walk in, it doesn't have a chic dining look, it's one of those hole in the walls that blows your mind.

data.title: Could be a choice if you are starving and on the run.
data.text:
A lot of food, for a single serving.
Needs more seasoning. 
The back of the place has some tables but the bathroom smell is very strong. 
People in the kitchen doesn't seem to care much about the taste. 

Good things
*fast 
*convenient
*non expensive
*large salsa & ships bar

data.title: Excellent Mexican food
data.text: Had dinner here the other night and it was terrific!!!   Huge burritos with well seasoned meat and authentic flavor.   A good selection of Mexican beers and curbside seating make this place one of my favorites.

data.title: Great Mexican Food for the Price
data.text: For the price it is hard to beat. I can be full on 1 Chicken Sopes that includes warm fried tortilla chips and fresh pico de gallo sauce from the condiment bar. What I love it that I can add grilled onions from the condiment bar on top of my sopes once it is served from the counter. You order at the register and they bring the food to your table. Sometimes there is fresh sliced oranges or watermelon at the condiment bar that I also have for dessert, no additional charge and of course all the peppers, salsas radish etc that you would expect from a Mexican restaurant included.  With a drink priced under $5, not bad. Having lived in Mexico for 5 years this is one of the  closest to the real thing I have found in CA. It is not 5 star dining, but that comes at a hefty price. But it is a great meal for under 5 dollars so in value it gets the 5 star rating. Fast friendly service, Good food. Never had a bad meal yet.Have eatten there many times and my granddaugther loves the pacman game they have in the restaurant for a few quaters we can play. Both at the Contra Costa Blvd. location in PH or at the Grant street location in Concord. I also like that they have the TV's on typically with futbol (soccer) in Spanish language. Seems more like Mexico to me.

data.title: This place is a gem
data.text: I go Los Gallos all the time and I'm never disappointed...the burritos are huge, the tacos delicious. Try the Shrimp Cocktail...loaded with shrimp. Everything's good but what separates it from the others is the salsa bar...load up on some complimentary chips then dive into the beautiful hand cut salsas, chiles, radishes and other tasty treats. Great place, great prices.

data.title: Delicious
data.text: I stopped in one day at lunch and ordered a shrimp burrito.  The shrimp was not overcooked and was abundant, I couldn't believe the size for the price and consumed the whole thing leaving me so full I didn't eat dinner.  I have since brought my husband and children to eat there and we have not had a bad meal yet.  It is a family atmosphere and the warmed chips and salsa bar are over the top.

data.title: Excellent restaurant, workers are always nice and friendly.
data.text: I usually go to the Los gallos in concord by todos Los santos park and they are great! Try the burrito banado they are really delicious and really big! They even have a guitar player every week, I think every Friday or Sunday but everyone's always no e and friendly.

data.title: Great Place for fast and...
data.text: Great Place for fast and good simple tacos. 1 taco with all the extras ("salsa bar") and free chips is only 1.85, for me I only need one. I have seen the burritos, and although I have never had one, they are enormous for about 5-6 bucks. Great place, close to the office!
